description.narrative: RHITES N-LANGO: The purpose of this contract is to increase the effective use of sustainable health services in the Lango Region of Northern Uganda through progress in the following key result areas: 1) Increased availability and accessibility of health services in facilities and communities; 2) Improved health system for quality services in facilities and communities; 3) Increased adoption of health behaviors by communities and individuals.

title.narrative: USAID Regional Health Integration to Enhance Services-North, Lango FY 2018 Annual Performance Report
